text: Steve Snitch (born ) is an English rugby league player. As of 2023, he plays in the Kingstone Press Championship for Doncaster. Snitch was born in Kingston upon Hull. He has played at club level for Wakefield Trinity, the Huddersfield Giants and the Castleford Tigers (Heritage â„– 902). Snitch played for Huddersfield in the 2006 Challenge Cup Final against St. Helens. In 2013, Snitch played for the Cairns based Super Cup team, the Northern Pride. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:English rugby league players
title: Steve Snitch
